GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Triaje a la llegada
Se puede asignar una mayor prioridad a los pacientes basándose en los síntomas. \n\nHabitación requerida: Recepción
Palpación abdominal

Tipo de examinación física. El examinador palpa nueve áreas del abdomen del paciente, realizándolo dos veces, superficial y profundamente. \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnóstico
Angiography
Surgical medical imaging method used to visualize the lumen of blood vessels and organs, particulary arteries, veins and heart. \n\nRequired room: CAG room
Audiometría
El test audiométrico determina la capacidad auditiva del paciente. \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnóstico
Muestreo de microorganismos

El muestreo de microorganismos se basa en recoger muestras de fluidos corporales de los pacientes con el fin de analizarlos. 

Habitación requerida: Laboratorio 

Equipamiento necesario:: Matraces + Microscopio
Cultivo de microorganismos

Cultivo de laboratorio de muestras específicas obtenidas del paciente para determinar la presencia de bacterias específicas. 

Required room: Laboratorio 

Equipamiento necesario:: Matraces + Microscopio
Barium swallow X-ray
Specific X-ray imaging, when patient must swallow barium sulfate that shows up on x-ray. It is used to examine the esophagus, stomach, and GI tract. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
Prueba visual básica

Prueba visual básica para examinar la agudeza visual del paciente. 

Habitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnóstico 

Required equipment: Eye test
Biposia - Muestreo

Procedimiento quirúrgico para recoger una muestra de tejido para examinarlo bajo el microscopio . 

Habitación requerida: Laboratorio 

Equipamiento necesario: Matraces + Microscopio
Biopsy - testing

Surgical removal procedure of piece of tissue to be examined under a microscope. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Glassware + Microscope
Blood pressure measurement
Classical manual measure examination of blood pressure and pulse (heartbeat) using sphygmomanometer. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
Blood draw

Procedure to collect sample of patient blood for further analysis or testing. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Hematoanalyzer
Analisis Sangíneo

Laboratory analysis of blood sample, which is extracted from the patient's vein. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Hematoanalyzer
Toma de muestras CBC

CBC - Complete Blood Count test determines increase or decrease of all blood cells. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Hematoanalyzer
Prueba CBC

CBC - Complete Blood Count test determines increase or decrease of all blood cells. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Hematoanalyzer
Analísis Sanguineo - ICU

Special Critical care Blood analysis for ICU. 

Required room: ICU room 

Required equipment: Hematoanalyzer
ElectroCardigorama - ICU

Special Critical care echocardiography for ICU. 

Required room: ICU room 

Required equipment: FAST usg
CRP

C - reactive protein test is diagnostic method based on quick blood test measuring concentration of mentioned protein, that indicates presence ov various problems or diseases. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
TAC
Tomografia Axial Computerizada - CT is diagnostic imaging examination creating detailed images of internal organs, tissues, blood vessels. \n\nRequired room: CT room
CT - enterography

Computed tomography - CT is diagnostic imaging examination creating detailed images of internal organs, tissues, blood vessels. With intravenous contrast material after the ingestion of liquid that helps produce high resolution images. \n\nRequired room: CT room
Observación de las orejas
Examination and visual inspection of the patient's ears, including the ear canal and the eardrum. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
ECG
Electrocardiography is examination process of recording patient's electrical activity of the heart using electrodes placed on the skin. Recording takes some time. \n\nRequired room: Cardiography unit
EEG
Electroencephalography checks for unusual patterns of electrical activity in brain. \n\nRequired room: Neurolab
Echo
Echocardiography is sonographic examination using Doppler ultrasound to create images of the heart, arteries, veins. \n\nRequired room: Cardiography unit
EMG
Electromyography evaluates and records electrical activity of skeletal muscles. \n\nRequired room: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Evaluation
Diagnostic method of considering all symptoms and examination recently made to specify the diagnosis. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
FAST
Special sonography method for Trauma center and ICU. \n\nRequired room: Trauma center, ICU
Elastase test - sampling

It is the specific diagnostic method used to measure levels of pancreas-produced enzyme in patient's stool sample. It indicates the actual pancreas function. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: RIA
Elastase test - testing

It is the specific diagnostic method used to measure levels of pancreas-produced enzyme in patient's stool sample. It indicates the actual pancreas function. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: RIA
Mycologic sampling

Collecting specific sample obtained from the patient's body used to determine a presence of a specific fungus. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Glassware + Microscope
Fungal culture

Laboratory cultivation of the specific sample obtained from the patient's body used to determine a presence of a specific fungus. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Glassware + Microscope
Gastroscopy

Examination and diagnostic procedure where a flexible tube with a tiny video camera and a light source is used to examine upper part of digestive tract through the oral way.\n\nRequired room: Office / Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology dpt
Gonioscopy
Gonioscopy is one of the eye examination method to evaluate the internal drainage system of the eye.
Monitorización del corazón

Special longterm examination method to monitor electrical activity of the heart and heartbeat rhythm. 

Required room: ICU / Trauma center / Observation room 

Requiered equipment: Wall monitor / Anesthetic machine
Escuchar el pecho
Puede hacerse con o sin estetoscopio. En caso que si se llama "auscultar". \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnostico
Laryngoscopy
Endoscopial examination of the larynx to obtain view of the vocal cords, glottis. Facilitates tracheal intubation. \n\nRequired room: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU
MRI
Imagenes detalladas del cuerpo son creada por un campo magnetico y por ondas de radio. \n\nHabitación requerida: Sala de MRI
Inspeción de la cavidad nasal
Examen e inspección visual de la nariz del paciente inclueyendo la cavidad nasal interior. \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnostico
Palpación del cuello
El examinador pala. It could be the anterior as the posterior area. \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnostico
Prueba neurologica
Series of simple and specific questions and test, that provide crucial informations about the state of the nervous system. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
Oftalmologia

Routine eye examination method used to see inside the fundus of the eye. \n\nRequired room: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt
Oral cavity inspection
Examination and visual inspection of the patient's oral cavity. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
PCR - sampling

Polymerase chain reaction is quick examination method of identifying infectious disease caused by bacteria or viruses. Examination is quick, cheap and exact. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Thermal cycler
PCR - testing

Polymerase chain reaction is quick examination method of identifying infectious disease caused by bacteria or viruses. Examination is quick, cheap and exact. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Thermal cycler
Perimetry
Perimetry is ophtalmology test examining complete field of vision. \n\nRequired room: Office / Diagnostic Unit at Neurology dpt.
Peritoneal fluid analysis - sampling

Diagnostic test that analyzes the fluid collected from the peritoneal space. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + Lab analyzer
Peritoneal fluid analysis - testing

Diagnostic test that analyzes the fluid collected from the peritoneal space. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + Lab analyzer
Physical examination
Examination of the specific area on the patient's body. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
Comentar
Hablar con el paciente para obtener información que puede ser crucial para el diagnostico \n\nHabitación requerida: Cualquier oficina / Unidad de diagnostico
Serologic sampling

It is a special blood test, looking for specific antibodies and antigens, which are unique proteins made by human immune system as reaction to contact with specific viruses, bacterias, diseases. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + RIA
Serologic test - testing

It is a special blood test, looking for specific antibodies and antigens, which are unique proteins made by human immune system as reaction to contact with specific viruses, bacterias, diseases. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + RIA
Skin injection test

Injection of a different small amounts of allergen extracts into the skin, usually on arm to confirm or deny the allergic reaction of the body. \n\nRequired room: Offices / Diagnostic units at Emergency dpt / ICU dpt / Neurology dpt
Speech listening
Listening to speech flow of the patient. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
Spinal Fluid Analysis sampling

Needle is inserted into the lower back removing amount of cerebrospinal fluid. Then is fluid examined in the laboratory. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + Lab analyzer
Spinal Fluid Analysis testing

Needle is inserted into the lower back removing amount of cerebrospinal fluid. Then is fluid examined in the laboratory. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Ultracentrifuge + Lab analyzer
Spirometry
One of the most common pulmonary function test, measuring lung function. \n\nRequired room: Offices / Units at Emergency dpt / ICU dpt / Internal Medicine dpt
Stool collecting

Procedure to collect a sample of patient's stool fo further analysis. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Stool analyzer
Stool analysis

Method is providing comprehensive wide palette of stool analysis. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Stool analyzer
Sweat Chloride Test
Special biochemical test used to diagnose Cystic fibrosis. \n\nRequired room: Office / Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Temperature measurement
Examination to determine the actual body temperature. \n\nRequired room: Any office / Diagnostic unit
Thorax percussion

It is the diagnostic method of tapping on a surface of thorax used in clinical examination. \n\nRequired room: Offices / Diagnostic Units at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology dpt
Tonometry
Test that measures pressure inside the eye. \n\nRequired room: Neurolab
Transient Elastography
Special imaging method that maps elastic properties and stiffness of soft tissues in human body like internal organs. \n\nRequired room: Sonography unit
PS blood control

Post surgery blood control is used in post-operative care in patients that could suffer from sepsis. 

Required room: Cardiography unit 

Required equipment: Lab analyzer
Urine analysis - sampling

Laboratory biochemical method of analysis of the urine sample. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Lab analyzer
Urine analysis - testing

Laboratory biochemical method of analysis of the urine sample. 

Required room: Stat Lab 

Required equipment: Lab analyzer
USG
Ultrasonography is medical diagnosis technique based on the application of ultrasound resulting in visualization of both soft and hard tissues and organs. \n\nRequired room: Sonography unit
X-ray back
X-ray imaging of the bones and shadows of some tissues of back. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
X-ray head
X-ray imaging of the bones and shadows of some tissues of head. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
X-ray lower limb
X-ray imaging of the bones and shadows of some tissues of lower limb. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
X-ray torso
X-ray imaging of the bones and shadows of some tissues of torso. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
X-ray upper limb
X-ray imaging of the bones and shadows of some tissues of upper limb. \n\nRequired room: X-ray room
Differential diagnosis
Special type of examination that could be used only by the doctor with Advance diagnosis specialization. It reduces total number of possible final diagnosis.
